ygData.subject: Tunare badass GM
ygData.msgSnippet: I started a character on tunare server , and made it to level 6 then a GM called me saying that my name didnt fit in the game... In my opinion it fitted really
ygData.messageBody:
I started a character on tunare server , and made it to level 6
then a GM called me saying that my name didnt fit in the game...
In my opinion it fitted really good to myself , but they say it has to fit with the game...
In years of online rpgs I've met the most childish and lifeless people but my god
no one was close to the stupidity of that GM.
he told me I had only one minute to give a new name so I asked him if I could change it later and he said "sure" , so I came out with a meaningless name I tought I would have been able to get rid of in a few days...
but when I petitioned again asking to change my name he said :
"No I wont change your name again :)"
I asked him why and he said the matter was closed and he had no time to change my name again.
I told him that the name of my char is very important to me and he appeared to me
and started making me turn around (Like when your stunned but 10 times faster)
I tought he wanted to joke but he stood there watching me turn for like 10 minutes (no time to deal with me eh ?)
all I could do was casting a spell on him and he said (that really got on my nerves):
"Attacking me can result in a ban"
I asked him if he was kidding but he was "dead serious"
I asked him why couldnt he just change my name (takes 5 secs) and he reported me !
that got me mad so I told him that it will be fun if I meet him in real life where hes not 40 levels over me
Of course he said : "are you treathening me ?"
at that point I logged out cause I still want to play EQ
Is there any way I can report this retard children (getting his address would be too nice :)?
If guides are there to help people out then Verant should really select them with much more care...
If there is something I can do to change my name (other guides on tunare) or against that guide please let me know !
If not I would have to restart since the name I got now really stinks
